verbose_text: Specifically, by using DC- and CD4 + T cell specific Smad7-knockout mice, we have uncovered that Smad7 mediates intestinal inflammation by limiting PDL2/1-PD1 signaling, a major immunoregulatory axis in Treg differentiation and immune tolerance.
evidence: Smad7 mediates intestinal inflammation by limiting PDL2/1-PD1 signaling, a major immunoregulatory axis in Treg differentiation
